channel.title: Whats the craziest thing you've done @ walmart?
channel.description:
so me and my friends almost got arrested tonight at walmart because of these reasons... 1) i made a porno audio sound track and played at max on the most expensive radio. 2) i took other people's carts and ran around then dumped them out 3) my friend hit customers in the head with balls and roped one person. 4) we yell'ed at the top of our lungs over the intercom and we made racist and sexual jokes over it... 5) finaly my friends saw a cop so we ran after him with fake swords and dumped everything off the shelves as we ran past him while my friend dumped 2 bottles of soap on the floor so when he ran twards us he actualy fell. it was funny till we got caught running out of the store. but we did a retard move and ran. they didnt even come after us.
[size=14pt]SO WHAT HAVE YOUR GUYS DONE??[/size]

item.title: Whats the craziest thing you've done @ walmart?
item.dc:creator: @codyskate5021 codyskate5021
item.description:
@codyskate5021 wrote:

[quote=“The Outsider, post:7, topic:423397”][quote author=codyskate5021 link=topic=526034.msg3830909#msg3830909 date=1322557631]

You should of vidded it, then we could of believed you.

we have a video but my friends to much of a pussy to upload it he thinks we will get in trouble even though like 5000 people have done it already… but the video stops when we saw the cop we just video taped up to him slipping… tomorrow when we hang out i am gonna send the video to my phone I can upload it… anyways… you done anything ???

No, I don’t have a Walmart I have an Asda, and I have to shop there…

why do you have to shop there? there is winco safeway and other stores that carry all the same stuff… i could see if you go there for electronics… best buy is way to over priced on everyhting
[/quote]
Because I have a family to feed, and if I didn’t shop there we would starve. We’re not all teenagers you know.[/quote]
oh. good you have a family. but wal mart food is id shop at winco before walmart

Read full topic
item.source: Whats the craziest thing you've done @ walmart?

item.title: Whats the craziest thing you've done @ walmart?
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

I made a space shuttle out of knives, forks and spoons, flew to the moon, flew back, dug up John F. Kennedy’s body, took him to the moon, brought him back down, made my space shuttle into a submarine and then went and found Bin Laden’s body.
This story contains the same level of bullshit as yours.

Read full topic
